item.title: Eva add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "The mark of a great man is one who knows when to set aside the important things in order to accomplish the vital ones." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Eva add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
Eva add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
Eva add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "Oh, Wax has always been solemn, but when he's at his best, there's a smirk underneath." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Eva add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
Eva add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "I need something, Wax. A place to look. You always did the thinking.” “Yes, having a brain helps with that, surprisingly." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Eva add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "You are inexperienced. So was I, once. So is every man. The measure of a person is not how much they have lived. . . It's in how they make us of what life has shown them." -- Brandon Sanderson
